Main Objectives: Improve building condition; Decrease energy use; Determine if future retrofit projects are successful.
Key Actions: Check fuel and electrical use monthly; Survey buildings for layout, insulation, condition, and safety; Collect and analyze baseline data; Maintain a maintenance notebook; Monitor data related to seasonal energy use and building operation.
Stakeholders: Contractors; Traditional Council; Project staff; Tribal finance director; Tribal building maintenance manager; Occupants; Cold Climate Housing Research Center (CCHRC)
Timeline: Monthly (energy bill analysis); Period just prior to the energy audit (for baseline data); Mid-2019 (time of publication)

Main Objectives: Improve building condition; Decrease energy use; Provide electricity and heat via wind turbines.
Key Actions: Survey buildings; Analyze energy bills; Maintain a maintenance notebook; Collect and manage data (annual fuel oil use, monthly electrical energy use).
Stakeholders: I.R.A. Council; Project staff; Tribal finance officer; Contractors; Service providers; Local utility; Emergency services; Building occupants.

Main Objectives: Create a data monitoring plan for each building to track building improvements; Prepare an Energy Action Plan.
Key Actions: 1. Meet to discuss project goals. ; 2. Collect baseline data. ; 3. Create a data monitoring plan. ; 4. Complete on-site assessments. ; 5. Prepare a draft Energy Action Plan. ; 6. Present the draft plan for feedback. ; 7. Revise and finalize the plan. ; 8. Provide the final plan to the Tribe.
Stakeholders: Tribe, CCHRC (Cold Climate Housing Research Center), Energy Audits of Alaska, building staff

Main Objectives: - Improve building condition; - Decrease energy use; - Solicit funding for building improvements
Key Actions: - Survey buildings; - Analyze energy bills; - Develop a thorough project plan; - Create a maintenance notebook; - Treat and paint siding; - Investigate and eliminate unknown electric load; - Install setback thermostats; - Upgrade lighting to LEDs; - Replace bath fans
Stakeholders: - I.R.A. Council; - Contractors; - Service providers; - Local utility; - Emergency services; - The Tribe; - Occupants; - Energy auditor; - Project staff
